revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The orations of Lysias and Isocrates, transl. from the Greek with some account of their lives and a discourse on the history, manners and character of the Greeks......"
revision.text: Possibly: The orations of Lysias and Isocrates, transl. from the Greek with some account of their lives and a discourse on the history, manners and character of the Greeks... : By John Gillies. (London, 1778). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/187051992
